messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] VegetarianTeen.Com Looking for Teen Writers
messages.msgSnippet: I am posting this for a friend who is editor of Vegetarian Baby and Child magazine (for which I am the new Book Review Editor).  This is for a new web site and
messages.messageBody:
I am posting this for a friend who is editor of Vegetarian Baby and
Child magazine (for which I am the new Book Review Editor). This is for
a new web site and could be a great experience for teen writers.

Jake

*******************
Calling all veg teens (and tweens!) - VegetarianTeen.com is looking for
young writers to share their ideas on topics related to vegetarianism
including (but not limited to!) animal rights, activism, nutrition,
dealing
with family, peer pressure, cruelty-free living, eco-decor, volunteering
and
more. We also present book, music and product reviews for our readers,
so
contact us even if you are interested only in doing reviews. Last, but
not
least, we do interviews with authors, athletes, and celebrities, so this
is
your chance to interview a famous vegetarian! Writing for VT.com is a
great
opportunity to get published, and we fully support your privacy. All
under
18's require a parental consent form. Please contact
editor@... or interviews@... specifically
to
be included on the interview list.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Melanie Wilson, Owner/Editor
Vegetarian Baby & Child Magazine
www.vegetarianbaby.com
Announcing... www.vegetarianteen.com
Coming soon to a computer near you!
*******************
--
Jake Marcus: freelance writer and editor; lawyer; homeschooling
work-at-home mom to Luca (7/94), Nicholas (5/97), & Aidan (3/00).
mailto:jmarcus@...
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
